title: Episode 90 w/ Wyclef
itunes:title: Episode 90 w/ Wyclef
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with the multi-talented Wyclef Jean! They discuss the early days leading into the Fugees and recording at the Bugga Basement. They also talk about Clef's solo career working with the likes of Santana, and Shakira as well as his involvement in the Canibus / LL battle, his political aspirations and a lot more! --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
